trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable item inside a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa um item selecionável dentro de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Menu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: MenuItem is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: MenuItem é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, que significa que o cabeçalho e a coleção de objetos pode ser de qualquer tipo (como cadeia, a imagem ou o painel).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: A MenuItem can have submenus.
trans-unit.target: Um MenuItem pode ter os submenus.

trans-unit.source: The submenu of the MenuItem is made up of the objects within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection> of a MenuItem.
trans-unit.target: O submenu do MenuItem é constituído por objetos dentro do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>de um MenuItem.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: It is common for a MenuItem to contain other MenuItem objects to create nested submenus.
trans-unit.target: É comum para um MenuItem conter outros objetos MenuItem para criar os submenus aninhados.

trans-unit.source: A MenuItem can have one of several functions: - It can be selected to invoke a command.
trans-unit.target: Um MenuItem pode ter uma das várias funções:-podem ser selecionada para invocar um comando.

trans-unit.source: - It can be a separator for other menu items.
trans-unit.target: -Pode ser um separador de outros itens de menu.

trans-unit.source: - It can be a header for a submenu.
trans-unit.target: -Pode ser um cabeçalho para um submenu.

trans-unit.source: - It can be checked or unchecked.
trans-unit.target: -Pode ser seleccionada ou desmarcada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > By default, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> of a MenuItem is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Por predefinição, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>de um MenuItem está definido como <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default horizontal position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A posição horizontal da predefinição de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>é <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> property of a MenuItem through a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, the stack panel's default is applied and the item is centered.
trans-unit.target: Se definir o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>propriedade de um MenuItem através de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, predefinido do painel pilha é aplicado e centra-se o item.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: TheMenuItem handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> event, so if you attach an event handler to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>, your handler will never be called.
trans-unit.target: Identificadores de TheMenuItem o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>eventos, por isso, se ligar a um processador de eventos para <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>, o processador nunca será chamado.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: To add your own handler, subscribe to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown> event or subscribe to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar o seus próprios processador, subscrever o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown>eventos ou subscrever <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>chamando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>com `handledEventsToo` definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the MenuItem Control To apply the same property settings to multiple MenuItem controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Personalizar o MenuItem controlo para aplicar as mesmas definições de propriedade para controlos de MenuItem de múltiplas, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Pode modificar a predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para lhe dar controlo um aspeto exclusivo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [personalizar o aspeto de um controlo existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the MenuItem, see [Menu Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e Estados que são específicos para o MenuItem, consulte [Menu estilos e modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controlo podem ser definidas pelo estilo de predefinido do controlo.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo predefinido, a propriedade poderá alterar o valor predefinido do quando o controlo é apresentado na aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo predefinido é determinado pelo qual tema de ambiente de trabalho é utilizado quando a aplicação está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [predefinido o WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in MenuItem control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definir uma propriedade visual apenas terá um efeito se essa propriedade ambos presentes no modelo de predefinido do controlo de MenuItem e é definida através da utilização de um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na secção "Alterar o Visual estrutura de um controlo" [personalizar o aspeto de um controlo existente, criando um ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command associated with the menu item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o comando associado ao item de menu.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to associate a command with a particular <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> instance.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é utilizada para associar um comando um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>instância.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The following example associates the **Copy** command with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> and automatically supplies the input gesture text **Ctrl+C**.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo seguinte associa a **cópia** comando com uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>e automaticamente fornece o texto de entrada gesto **Ctrl + C**.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The example does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> property, but the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is "Copy" at run time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo não define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>propriedade, mas o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>é "Copiar" no tempo de execução.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify another header for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> if you want it to be different.
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar outro cabeçalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>se pretende que seja diferente.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: For information on how to bind to the desired command, see [Add a Command to a MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como ligar para o comando pretendido, consulte [adicionar um comando a um MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370).

trans-unit.source: [!code-xml[MenuItems_snip#MenuItemCommand](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/MenuItems_snip.Menus/Pane1.xaml#menuitemcommand)] A command is raised when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is clicked—just after the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> event.

trans-unit.source: The command is raised on the element according to the following priorities: 1.
trans-unit.target: O comando é gerado no elemento de acordo com as prioridades seguintes: 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu selects different item containers, depending on the type of the item in the underlying collection or some other heuristic.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o menu seleciona os contentores de item diferentes, dependendo do tipo de item na colecção subjacente ou alguns outro heuristic.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful if you want to create a menu by binding to a collection.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é útil se pretender criar um menu por enlace numa coleção.

trans-unit.source: The item container is the UI element that displays the object in a collection.
trans-unit.target: O contentor de item é o elemento de IU que mostra o objeto numa coleção.

trans-unit.source: If you want to bind to a collection to create a menu that contains <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> objects, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase.UsesItemContainerTemplate%2A> property to true and create an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> for each type of object in your collection.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender vincular a uma coleção para criar um menu que contém <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>objetos e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>objetos, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase.UsesItemContainerTemplate%2A>propriedade para VERDADEIRO e criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate>para cada tipo de objeto na sua coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase.UsesItemContainerTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> must contain either a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate>tem de conter um um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>ou um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate>
